policies.policy_description: Policy for users to create compute instances
policy_statements: Allow group 'THESIS_USERS' to manage instance-family in compartment Pwn
Allow group 'THESIS_USERS' to read app-catalog-listing in compartment Pwn
Allow group 'THESIS_USERS' to use volume-family in compartment Pwn
Allow group 'THESIS_USERS' to use virtual-network-family in compartment Pwn
